welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ciudad Madero, Mexico! Take in the city's charming seaside atmosphere, known for its beautiful beaches, delicious seafood, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Big quesadillas
restaurants.description: Big quesadillas is a mexican restaurant located in Madero.
restaurants.address: Ave juarez (Ave primero de mayo), Madero, Tamaulipas
